CustomField.description: Text field applicable to only HCO that will store the abbreviated name of the Japanese organization. Needed for INS-DOC records where the OOB SFDC name is a concatenation of HCP Kanji @ HCO Abbreviated name
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Text field applicable to only HCO that will store the abbreviated name of the Japanese organization. Needed for INS-DOC records where the OOB SFDC name is a concatenation of HCP Kanji @ HCO Abbreviated name
CustomField.label: Abbreviated Name
